attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Rt. Hon. Gordon Brown
I am a strong labour party supporter for several years. I strongly believe in your leadership. Britain and the rest of the world needs you more than ever in this difficult climate. No other person in Britain can substitute you. I can see and feel there is a tiny corrupted regime exists within the labour party. They are like headless chickens. Tony Blair and his corrupted aides mostly responsible for today's law opinion poll. Millbank proved he not only just look like an idiot. Why are they still in your cabinet? It is time to eleminate those who betray your trust and show your strong leadership qualities.
Thank you
Yours Sincerely
Marshel Arasan
Tel: 020 8866 4118
Mob : 07939 289 699

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
